issue.title: REST Adapter: let the CredentialsClient wait a bit for credits before returning an error
issue.body: Before returning a 503 response (as implemented in #391) because the credentialsClient doesn't have credits yet, the REST Adapter should wait a bit for the credits to arrive.

body: @pellmann any idea how to address this issue in the meantime? Or do we want to wait for this being fixed in vert.x 3.5.1?
I made a locale fix, where I wrote the cause in the vertx context and used this later - but it is a bad hack und I think the 401 is not such a big problem.. so I think we could wait - WDYT?
well, it requires the client to handle two different errors when in fact there is only ever one ... I would rather implement a *temporary hack* than requiring clients to treat 401 as 503 ...
Okay, I will prepare a PR.
@pellmann do we have a test case for this?
We have a unit test where we put an exception with 401 and test for this at the end. There are no systems tests for different situations, at the moment.
@calohmn please re-open if you still experience this issue.

issue.title: REST Adapter: returns 500 when credentialsClient has no credits yet
issue.body:
During the tests of nightly version after fix of #391, I found a  next problem. The REST Adapter returns now error code 500. 
See attached log of REST Adapter
[rest-adapter.log](https://github.com/eclipse/hono/files/1501627/rest-adapter.log)
